name: jsspeccy
description: a ZX Spectrum emulator in the browser

scripts.test: npm run build && node --experimental-wasm-modules test/test.js test/tests.in test/tests.expected
scripts.build:spectranet: emcc -s STANDALONE_WASM -s WASM=1 -s ERROR_ON_UNDEFINED_SYMBOLS=0 -g -gsource-map --source-map-base="http://localhost:8000/jsspeccy/" -sEXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=_nic_w5100_reset,_nic_w5100_read,_nic_w5100_write,_nic_w5100_io,_recv_buffer,_compat_rx_data -s spectranet/*.c --no-entry -o dist/jsspeccy/jsspeccy-spectranet.wasm
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/jsspeccy && mkdir -p dist/spectranet && cp -r -f spectranet/* dist/spectranet && cp static/index.html dist/ && cp static/favicon.ico dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp COPYING dist/ && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/ && cp -r static/roms dist/jsspeccy && cp -r static/tapeloaders dist/jsspeccy
scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:spectranet && npm run build:wasm:debug && npm run build:js && npm run build:static
scripts.build:release: npm run build:core && npm run build:spectranet && npm run build:wasm:release && npm run build:js && npm run build:static

author: Matt Westcott
